Package org.apache.juneau.httppart.bean

Class RequestBeanPropertyMeta

java.lang.Object
org.apache.juneau.httppart.bean.RequestBeanPropertyMeta
public class RequestBeanPropertyMeta extends Object
Represents the metadata gathered from a getter method of a class annotated with Request.
See Also:
